introText: Hooray! Thanks for considering us for your bridal registry! Your Kallah Registry consultant is here to help you and make opening a registry a great experience. We are here to guide and advise you in creating a well balanced list. From the moment you create your registry until after you walk down the aisle will be there to help you in any way you need.
contactsTitle: To set up an appointment, fill out the information or contact us directly at:
